short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your Facebook Messenger and follow up effectively with Calendar reminders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Facebook Messenger custom tagging and calendar reminders to organise your messages at various different stages of your business status. Also setting reminders to your calendar to follow up.

How many times have you forgot to follow up with the person whom you promised that you would?!!
NekeTag’s unique follow up system allows for notes and a reminder date and time. The huge advantage is that this entry is made in your calendar and does not require your extension to be running

NekeTag is exactly what you need to keep on top of your clients’ needs and help close those sales

NekeTag allows you to assign labels to customers/clients depending on what stage you are at in conversation with the customer. Without having to scroll through hundreds messages! 

★ Features
★ No Setups
★ Simple Organisation of  your FB Messages in messenger.com
★ Assign different labels to messages – Labels can be customized if required
★ Unique filter to call up messages at the varying stages
★ Never waste time scrolling through your conversations trying to find the right one


This extension only works with www.messenger.com – It will not work with the installed messenger app.

Instructional videos available label changing – if required
